name: LonlyToy
description: When you want to relax, you can try this game.You can control the character to pass through various obstacles.You can use "A","D" on the keyboard to control left and right, and space to control jumping. You descend to the next level when you have reached the signpost after crossing all obstacles and mechanisms.You can buy HP at the store. When you end the game due to a trigger mechanism in the middle of the game, you can continue the game from the position before the trigger mechanism by consuming HP instead of restarting.
